body.name: Signature Design by Ashley Socalle 6 Drawer 59" Dresser, Beige

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Signature Design by Ashley Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 14 hrs 51 mins
features: FINE DESIGN: Made of engineered wood enhanced with a natural finish over replicated oak grain; smooth-gliding drawers slide easily on metal ball bearings
HIGH-STYLE LOOK: Sporting dark pewter-tone pulls for a modern touch and vinyl wrapped drawer sides/back for extra durability, this dresser proves that high-style furniture can be affordably priced
CHIC STORAGE: Measuring 59" W x 18.88" D x 33.88" H, this bedroom dresser can be used to keep your wardrobe tidy; perfect for baby clothes or in a kids room, too
Easy-to-follow instructions and hardware included. Two people recommended. Screwdriver and hammer (not included) required for assembly
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget
body.description: Light and bright, this dresser is inspired by chic design. A light natural finish over replicated oak grain offers an authentic touch to this so-cool piece. It beautifully blends the hues of natural living with the edginess of your modern lifestyle. Whether you need storage space for clothes, linens or toys, you're sure to find the right fit. Your dream bedroom is closer than you think–our wide selection of finishes and features fulfill your decor needs, from casual to contemporary. And we go the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner. Trust us to bring your space to life with furniture and decor that show off your style and personality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice chest of drawers.
reviews.reviewText: This is a very heavy chest of drawers. Nice quality, though it is compressed wood. Seems more durable than most furniture of this type. The reclaimed wood appearance is very nice, but realize that it is more of a wallpaper replication of reclaimed wood. It is very, very nice for the price. I recommend this if you do not want to spend 4 times the price for a real wood chest of drawers. The instructions to assemble were very precise. It suggests 2 people to assemble. I am a 60 year old woman and I assembled this by myself with no issues. It did take me almost 2 hours to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Drawers are flimsy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The look of dressers are stylish but the quality is very poor. The drawer bottoms fall through unless u keep socks inside them anything more then that will prolapse the bottoms of all drawers. Took awhile to put metal stands on the bottom of dresser🤦🏻‍♀️ Have to adjust the drawer bottoms daily since they prolapse really disappointing with that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to put together
reviews.reviewText: Some of the pieces- specifically the hardware for the footing didn’t line up correctly. It took a wrench and a hammer to bend the welded pieces to get them to sit right. Very frustrating. Other than that-final look is very nice, not sure about the drawer materials… will see how they hold up, seem a bit flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not good quality and waste of money
reviews.reviewText: We bought 2 of these. At first they worked and seemed nice but once you put stuff into the drawers they begin to break. both chests have broke. The bottoms came out of two drawers and both chests are off and hard to shut. They come off track.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL if you only need it for one year.
reviews.reviewText: The dresser and nightstands are perfect and come exactly as is. Building was not fun and came with cheap materials and I ended up resorting to actual screws rather than their plastic inserts they supply. The biggest flaw from the beginning was the bottom of the drawers. They are weak and cheap. This drawer will work perfectly for LIGHT items such as baby clothes. We had this and about 4 months in had to take it apart to reinforce the bottoms. Here we are 1 year down and the drawers have completely collapsed. Kind of wish I listened to the reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WORTH IT ALL THE WAY!!
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect for the space I need it to be. Took me 3 hours but I was with my 1 year old so it’s durable. Super easy assembly just follow the instructions carefully. Don’t rush!! It’s perfect honestly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality. Drawers seem sturdy so far. Smaller than I had thought. Didn’t pay attention to online measurements. A little bigger than a bedside table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the bed frame dresser and nightstands, all in “whitewash” however I received the wrong color in the nightstands and dresser. Honestly if I’m paying 300 for a dresser I better receive the correct one. Also, the product was made sloppy, I can’t even screw the metal base onto the actual dresser because the welding marks where the metal connects prevents the screw from laying flat so my dresser is just sitting on top of the base, I literally don’t have the energy nor the will to take this entire dresser apart to revive the correct color at this point. Yes the fruniture looks amazing and it is beautiful, it is overpriced and clearly nobody pays attention to what they are sending to customers, everyone in the comments complains about the screws for the tracks and those are easy Peasy, it’s the stupid. Also not to mention one of the drawers would not open even, even before I put the drawer actually in, I had to break pieces off the track for the drawer to actually open. Honestly save your money cause I don’t think this is worth anything more than maybe 200. In the photos you can see that they are 2 different finishes and colors and I triple checked, they should have been the same colors. Very disappointed
